description: This file sets up an agent using the DeepSeek model and DuckDuckGo tools, then makes a query about current events in France.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools.

classes.name: DeepSeek
classes.description: A model class used for deep search or inquiry tasks.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool class for performing searches via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the response from the agent after processing a query.
